captions.text:
Kokoro ni kakushiteta omoi 
I silently parse the feelings hidden

shizuka ni kotoba de kizande 
in my heart into words,

Fumidasu tesaguri na asu e 
Using each step I take to feel out

tsuyoku mayoinai hitomi de 
a new tomorrow with a strong, unfaltering gaze.

Donna mirai demo uketomeru watashi de itakute 
I want to be someone who can accept any future that comes;

Ima wa mou furimukanai 
I can’t look back now.

Hashiru shoudou ni makasete 
I give way to my dashing momentum,

hirogaru sekai e 
onward toward an expanding world,

Kawaru unmei ni kotae ga 
Believing there’s an answer

aru to shinjite 
within this changing fate.

Ano hi senmei ni egaita 
The unchanging dream

kawaranai yume wa 
 I drew out so vividly that day,

Fureta genkai mo kanarazu 
Will surely take me past

koeteiku kara 
the limits I felt.

Yuruginai koe ni shite 
If I use an unwavering voice,

todokeru kitto 
I’m sure it will be heard;

Itsuka tadoritsuku sono 
At least until I arrive

toki made 
there myself.

Afureru ikutsumo no kotae 
The answers that come pouring out

kienai negai o tashikamete 
validate this unyielding wish,

Umidasu uso no nai uta o 
And the song free of lies that is born

tsuyoku ashiato o kizande 
from it creates powerful footprints in rhythm.

Kizukanai furi de sugoshiteta watashi o wasurete 
I’ll forget the me who managed by pretending not to notice,

Tada kagayakeru basho e 
And head for a place that I can simply shine.

Yureru kanjou to namida no 
I’ll connect the rift between

hazama o tsunaide 
wavering emotions and tears,

Haruka chousen ni egaita 
Heading toward the far off scenery

keshiki no saki e 
I drew a straight line to.

Daita gensou to itami wa 
Even if my illusions and pains

senakaawase demo 
must come back to back,

Tsukamu shunkan o kanarazu 
I’m aiming for the moment

kanaetai kara 
I can take it all in hand.

Kurikaesu you ni shite 
Set it on repeat,

chikazuku motto 
getting closer and closer;

Tooku kasumu sora te o 
Reaching my hand out to a distant,

nobashite 
blurry sky.

Sasayaku you na ame ni 
Amidst whispering rain,

mune no oto ga 
the sound of my heart comes to

michiteku 
fruition,

yasashiku tsutsumu 
kindly wrapping me tight.

Kizutsuku hodo ni 
The more I was hurt,

akogareteta 
the more

ano koro no yakusoku wa 
I sought after it; the promise I made back

tsuzuiteiku... 
then continues on…

Hashiru shoudou ni makasete 
I give way to my dashing momentum,

hirogaru sekai e 
onward toward an expanding world,

Kawaru unmei ni kotae ga 
Believing there’s an answer

aru to shinjite 
within this changing fate.

Ano hi senmei ni egaita 
The unchanging dream I drew out

kawaranai yume wa 
so vividly that day,

Fureta genkai mo kanarazu 
Will surely take me past

koeteiku kara 
the limits I felt.

Yuruginai koe ni shite 
If I use an unwavering voice,

todokeru kitto 
I’m sure it will be heard;

Itsuka tadoritsuku sono 
At least until I arrive

toki made 
there myself.
e e eai~

Translation: Edmspack 
 Check: Rockymaxton 
Time: Edmspack / Rockymaxton

comments.text:
Very great but there are a lot of faults in the french subtitles like at 
0:23 "se sentiment" is "ce sentiment". 0:33 "accepté" is "accepter". 
"pourrait" is "pourraient" and "arrivé" is "arriver" or "regardé" is 
"regarder". You should look at all of these. But this song is truly 
amazing.﻿
